intro: Polybotrya suberecta, commonly known as the upright polybotrya, is a species of flowering plant in the family Polybotryaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Asia and is characterized by its compact, evergreen shrub form. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow, which bloom during the warmer months. Its leaves are elliptical,革质 (leathery), and arranged in whorls around the stems. Polybotrya suberecta is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and modest flowering display.
